programs.title: Cardio Blast
programs.description: A high-intensity cardio workout designed to improve cardiovascular health, burn calories, and increase endurance.

programs.title: Strength Training
programs.description: Build muscle, increase strength, and improve overall fitness with this resistance-based workout.

programs.title: Yoga Flow
programs.description: Find balance, flexibility, and inner peace with this gentle yet invigorating yoga practice.

programs.title: Powerlifting
programs.description: Learn proper form and technique for the squat, bench press, and deadlift while gaining strength and confidence.

programs.title: Pilates Fusion
programs.description: Strengthen your core, improve posture, and increase flexibility with a blend of Pilates and other fitness techniques.
